about_the_game:
This is complete sountrack from "The Last Rolling Hero"
Included 16 tracks and Mikhail Paramonov and Alexander Skryabin

1 Go back 4:11
2 Rifleshot 2:34
3 Dreamless 5:27
4 Gallery 7:11
5 Experience 2:12
6 Marko 3:14
7 Formal 2:55
8 Limerence 2:36
9 Dubnight 2:48
10 Second limb 3:39
11 Your next life 3:36
12 Cube Attacs 3:22
13 B-bonus 2:01
14 Cleampy 3:26
15 Deep mind 3:45
16 Deeply 3:42

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04/SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i-Series at 2GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 550ti with 1GB VRAM or analogue
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04/SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i-Series at 2GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 550ti with 1GB VRAM or analogue
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
